sentences.en: A firm might sometimes sell at a loss to drive a competitor out of business, and thereby increase its market power.
sentences.cn: 公司有时会通过亏本出售来将对手挤垮，从而提高其市场地位。

sentences.en: Animal products add flavor and variety to diet and thereby contribute to psychological well - being.
sentences.cn: 畜禽产品丰富了食物的风味和品种,对于心理健康也起一定的作用.

sentences.en: Grodius thereby grounded the natural law on an eternal reason pervading the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 据此,格劳休斯把自然法建立在一种遍及宇宙的永恒的理性的基础上.

sentences.en: He became a British citizen, thereby gaining the right to vote.
sentences.cn: 他成了英国公民, 因而得到了投票权.

sentences.en: He gave his life and thereby paid the ultimate price.
sentences.cn: 他牺牲了生命,从而付出了最大的代价.

sentences.en: Heat is thereby converted into mechanical energy of the piston.
sentences.cn: 热由此转换成活塞的机械能.

sentences.en: His home is hidden in the trees thereby.
sentences.cn: 他的家就在那附近的树林之中.

sentences.en: However, doing so would dramatically expand the message payload of the service, thereby possibly impacting its performance profile.
sentences.cn: 然而，这样做会显著扩展该服务的消息有效负载，从而可能影响其性能状况。

sentences.en: I have never been to that city; thereby I don't know much about it.
sentences.cn: 我从未去过那座城市, 因此对它不怎么熟悉.

sentences.en: One approach consists of varying only the total flow thereby maintaining the same thrust chamber hardware.
sentences.cn: 有一种方法是仅改变推进剂总流量,而推力室结构保持不变.

sentences.en: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation.
sentences.cn: 我们的身体能出汗，由此可以蒸发散热。

sentences.en: Regular exercise strengthens the heart, thereby reducing the risk of heart attack.
sentences.cn: 经常锻炼可以增强心脏机能，从而减少心脏病发作的危险。

sentences.en: She hoped thereby to convey the'immediacy'of existence.
sentences.cn: 她想借此表现人生中“亲切感 ”.

sentences.en: The designer can select small port diameters and thereby achieve better loading fractions.
sentences.cn: 设计人员可选择小的通道直径,从而能得到较好的装填系数.

sentences.en: The internal port geowetry is thereby determined.
sentences.cn: 这样就定出了内通道的几何形状.

sentences.en: This gives you the opportunity to pray for and bless the other thereby blessing yourself.
sentences.cn: 它其实是给了你一个机会，去为他人祈祷和祝福，从而赐福给你自己。

sentences.en: We may thereby compute the number of graphs which are isomorphic to their complements.
sentences.cn: 因此我们可以计算同构于其补的图的数目.

words.tran_cn: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
在那上面，在其上；…之后立即
从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

phrases.tran_cn: 这里面有一段故事；其中大有文章；说来话长

trans.tran_en: with the result that something else happens
